description: Mobile techniques used by Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.FakeInst.a, ATT&CK software S0306 v1.1
name: Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.FakeInst.a (S0306)

techniques.comment: [Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.FakeInst.a](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0306) uses Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) for command and control.(Citation: Kaspersky-MobileMalware)
